commands: cd /var/servers/ && mv slate-api-deployed/uploads/ /var/servers/ && mv slate-api-deployed/config/ /var/servers/ && rm -rf slate-api-deployed

cd /var/servers/ && mv slate-api/.[!.]* slate-api-deployed && mv slate-api/* slate-api-deployed && mv uploads slate-api-deployed && rm -rf slate-api-deployed/config && mv config slate-api-deployed && rm -rf slate-api

cd /var/servers/slate-api-deployed && port=3001 environment=dev allowEmails=true forever start -a --uid "slate" index.js -o /var/servers/slate-logs/out.log -e /var/servers/slate-logs/error.log -l /var/servers/slate-logs/log.log
